@Dragoonofinfinity Yup, 100% agreed. Though I have yet to find a 100% identical reupload, most of the time it's for very minor tweaks that don't really contribute much and don't justify a reupload. For the problem of finding which copy to pick among multiple reuploads, I generally pick the most recent one since it has good chances of having been fixed and/or decensored. The site needs a good revamp on many aspects, though it's the most convenient I have found to replace the good old free Fakku + the not constantly lagging Pururin.

XD

@Nekrozys while it's typically true that they usually change something, there are troll uploads where there's only a new page with some 5 minute Photoshop work on a single page (typically the cover page or one of the colored back pages) done for no reason. Even not counting those, it gets annoying having to look for a specific thing by an artist when there are 5 copies of every other thing they've done. I'd be on board if whoever does maintenance on this site decided to do some spring cleaning on duplicates.

The cycle of people complaining about reuploads (and yet never caring to check if there are any differences) continues. Biribiri changed Ouka from being an ogre to an oni which I guess is required to maintain coherence if a later chapter happens to feature an actual ogre. There's also been some minor tweaks with the text position in the bubbles. As far as I know there's never been a reupload that didn't change a thing from the previous work.
The cycle of reupload continues. By the way, I forget if it said this or not, but are orcs in this the green tribal men or the fat, ugly-as-sin walking pigs?
I'd like some more dragon in the next one.
